data

Class CallListDataAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • data.CallListDataAccess

  • public class CallListDataAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    This data-access class retrieves patient call lists and email messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CallListDataAccess.LastMeasurementDateType
      This enum indicates a type for a last measurement date collected in a call list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CallListDataAccess() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<Patient> getCallList(int clinicId, java.lang.String subject, CallListDataAccess.LastMeasurementDateType[] dateType, java.lang.Object referenceCharacters)
      This method uses the getCallList procedure in the database to find and return the list of patients to be contacted.
      static java.util.ArrayList<EmailMessage> getEmailMessages(int clinicId, java.lang.String subject)
      This method uses the getEmailMessages procedure in the database to find and return the list of email messages to be sent to selected patients in the call list.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getCallList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Patient> getCallList(int clinicId,
                                                       java.lang.String subject,
                                                       CallListDataAccess.LastMeasurementDateType[] dateType,
                                                       java.lang.Object referenceCharacters)
        This method uses the getCallList procedure in the database to find and return the list of patients to be contacted.
        Parameters:
        clinicId - the clinic ID
        subject - the call list subject
        dateType - the last measurement date type determined from the result set
        referenceCharacters - the character string
        Returns:
        the list of patients or null if no list is found

      • getEmailMessages

        public static java.util.ArrayList<EmailMessage> getEmailMessages(int clinicId,
                                                                 java.lang.String subject)
        This method uses the getEmailMessages procedure in the database to find and return the list of email messages to be sent to selected patients in the call list.
        Parameters:
        clinicId - the clinic ID
        subject - the call list subject
        Returns:
        the list of email messages or null if no messages are found
